t: I Have Calmed and Quieted My Soul
A Song of Ascents. Of David.
O*pn Lord,*s my heart is not lifted up; my*ld eyes are not raised too high; I*ln do not occupy myself with things too*ld great and too marvelous for me.
But*ln I have calmed and quieted my soul, like*ld a weaned child with its mother; like*ld a weaned child is my soul within me.
O*pn Israel, hope in the Lord*s from*ld this time forth and forevermore.
